casebody.data:
Sandhya DESMOND
v.
YALE-NEW HAVEN HOSPITAL, INC., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 12, 2018

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 181 Conn.App. 201, 185 A.3d 665 (2018), is denied.

ECKER, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
